nodes.text: "Rudy" was the name of the customized RDD-7 racing swoop owned by Grubber Vapps, a constable of Bartyn's Landing (Lamaredd). An amateur mechanic, Vapps spent most of his free time performing modifications on "Rudy", including a reinforced frame and a bow-mounted weapon. Although Vapps had modified several vehicles, he was particularly proud of "Rudy."
C. 29 BBY, some outlaws stole "Rudy" and Vapps and some friends of his did their best to recover the vehicle.
